channel.title: Rpc on rms1000watt
channel.description: Recent content in Rpc on rms1000watt

item.title: What is gRPC?
item.description: TLDR: After you get past the learning curve of the topic (which is the bulk of this post), gRPC is an amazing framework! gRPC is Google’s “…high performance, open-source universal RPC framework.” Which doesn’t really mean anything to the newcomer. To help you understand what this actually means, let’s look at what you’re already used to REST API and compare it gRPC. What you’re used to REST API = HTTP1.
